let's join together.  Hearing stories
from insiders about this
act of kindness,
at about 2:20 p.m. one afternoon,
our brothers were on duty at Binh An wharf
when they heard a loud noise like
something was falling.  went down to the river and heard
people shouting that someone had jumped into the river and
my brothers shouted to each other to go up and
save people and the operation was to untie the ropes of the
boat and our brothers controlled a
boat to approach.  The person jumped
in. And then when I got close to about
20 meters away from the victim, I
proactively put on my helmet and jumped down to
lift that person out of the water and the
brothers on the boat at that time assisted me.
Throwing ropes and buoys to bring me and the victim
to shore, people yelled at the people on the bridge.
If we could try to save
people or not, we would have to
run the boat out. When we could pull it up,
we could breathe a sigh of relief.  Although the house is small, I'm very happy
because I was able to save the victim.
On November 6, the Standing Office of the

created up to 95 minutes of the known universe.
These images combined together

early in the morning.  guy fox night festival as
england celebrates a historic event that
occurred in the early 17th century organizers
say the modern celebration dates back to
1847 making it the oldest event
of the  In the
UK, on ​​November 5 every year, people in
the UK celebrate Guy Fox Night,
inherited from a turbulent history.
This holiday is a national event that takes
place just a few days after Halloween.  In the
early 17th century, in the context of
fierce political and religious tensions between
English Catholics and Protestants,
plots to depose King James the
First of England increased after the
failure of the plot and life.  At
the king's memory, he decreed that the night of
November 5th would be a night of celebration.
This tradition was maintained by the British people
for many years until it became
Gy Fox Night or Bonfire Night.  The
festival's violent religious persecution scene has evolved over the
years and has stripped away any political significance
in favor of retaining its festive aspect
in the North of England.
attracts more than 18,000
spectators. Every year, Ken Scotland National Park
and the large castle in
Wells are also brightly lit on
this occasion. Last weekend, Thailand officially opened a
tourist train route from the capital.
Coming to visit Pass Zit Dam, the image of the
train floating on the water at
dawn is something many
tourists enjoy and look forward to the most on
this trip. The train travels from Bangkok to
Pass Solit Dam.  From November to
January every year, to take this train, you
have to leave before
sunrise. The train runs from the century-old Hoa Lo station
in Bangkok, passing through the lotus ponds of the
black and sour jungle.  rice fields in
the cool air of the early morning. 3 and a half hours
after leaving Bangkok, the group went to the Solit iron dam.
They had plenty of time to
visit, take photos and exchange prices
before returning to the Cao Khai yard next to the bridge.
it feels like the train is floating on the
water. I've been there many times and have booked
to go three more times this season. It's
great to travel outdoors
and enjoy the fresh air. This is the
first time.  I took a train in Thailand.
Solit iron dam is used for agricultural purposes
and flood prevention thanks to
tourist trains like this. The dam
is becoming a popular check-in point for many
tourists
right here.

Tan, 33 years old, from Ninh Thuan.
Initially, some of his friends who worked
together did not see Mr. Tan go to work and
did not answer the phone, so at noon on the same day
they went to his room on
Phan Street.  Dang Luu, Di An ward,

The victim can still be seen walking normally

Currently, the victim's body has been transferred to

autopsy since last weekend. Police in

patrol to handle traffic violations, on

cars and 85 motorbikes, many people, upon discovering that the

Binh Duong province has just temporarily detained two subjects to
investigate and clarify the act of exorbitant interest
in civil transactions. That is Tran Duc
Huu, born in 1986.  Hai Phong and
Nguyen Thi Tham were born in 1989 and reside in
Tan Uyen city, Binh Duong province.
According to the investigation, Tran Huu Duc runs a
pub business in
Di An city, Binh Duong province through
friendly and close relationships with people.  are
in need of borrowing money in the form of
installment payments and loan repayments by the day without
deduction from the principal. Through verification and collection of
documents and evidence, the investigation agency determined that
the subjects Huu and Tham have
lent money to many people at low rates.  Interest rate from 282 PH
to 475 PH last year, illegally profiting
over 100 million VND Working with the
police, the subjects admitted to committing
crimes. The case continues to be
